dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper presents a modeling approach for performing a risk analysis study of networked healthcare information systems The proposed method is based on CRAMM for studying the assets threats and vulnerabilities of the distributed information system and models their interrelationships using Bayesian networks The most critical events are identified and prioritized based on what if studies of system operation The proposed risk analysis framework has been applied to a healthcare information network operating in the North Aegean Region in Greece
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Modeling risk in distributed healthcare information systems.
